description: Sample front-end app using react, redux, (node) event, and es6 fetching from an API.

scripts.build: rm -fr ./dist ; mkdir dist ; NODE_ENV=production browserify  -t [ babelify ] -p [ minifyify --no-map ] ./src/main/index.js > ./dist/sample-app.js
scripts.build-dev: rm -fr ./dist ; mkdir dist ; NODE_ENV=development browserify --debug -t [ babelify ] ./src/main/index.js > ./dist/sample-app.js
scripts.source-map-explorer: rm -fr ./dist ; mkdir dist ; NODE_ENV=production browserify --debug -t [ babelify ] -p [ minifyify --map sample-app.js.map --output sample-app.js.map ] ./src/main/index.js > ./dist/sample-app.js ; source-map-explorer ./dist/sample-app.js ./sample-app.js.map
